# Force Lash, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** One standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a 6-inch strip of leather)

**Range:** Personal

**Effect:** 20-foot-long whip

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower website

You create a whip made of pure force that comes out of the palm of your hand. You can wield the whip as though you were proficient with it. The weapon has a 20-foot reach and inflicts 1d6 points of force damage for every level (maximum 20d6). You can also make grapple attacks with the weapon without provoking attacks of opportunity.
